amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds for the collection of a cost recovery fee in the West Coast Groundfish Trawl Catch Share Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to assess or collect the fee established by section 660.115 of title 50, Code of Federal Regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Huffman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.
